Manhattan.American Institute of Baking:
The American Institute of Baking, now known as AIB International, was founded in 1919 as a technology and information transfer center for bakers and food processors. The original mission was to "put science to work for the baker", a theme that has expanded yet remains central to our programs, products, and services.
Mission
Empower the global food industry to elevate their food safety and grain based production capabilities.
